name: artelier:tab
description: Experience masterpieces from world-renowned museums in every new tab
content_security_policy: default-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://fonts.googleapis.com https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' https://www.artic.edu https://api.artic.edu data: blob:; connect-src 'self' https://api.artic.edu https://www.artic.edu; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; style-src 'self' https://fonts.googleapis.com 'unsafe-inline'
